---
title: slidedeck_with_formulas
author: Me
---

## First formula

[math]
 \[\begin{aligned}
 \dot{x} &amp; = \sigma(y-x) \\
 \dot{y} &amp; = \rho x - y - xz \\
 \dot{z} &amp; = -\beta z + xy
 \end{aligned} \]
[/math]
 
---

## Second slide with a formula

[math]
 \[\begin{aligned}
 \dot{x} &amp; = \sigma(y-x) \\
 \dot{y} &amp; = \rho x - y - xz \\
 \dot{z} &amp; = -\beta z + xy
 \end{aligned} \]
[/math]
 
---

## Third slide

[math]
\[\begin{aligned}
\dot{y} &amp; = \rho x - y - xz \\
\end{aligned} \]
[/math]
